file_content.text: See you around.
Well look who the akk dog dragged in.
Taunt! Guys!
And this must be the handsome Sith you've been seeing the galaxy with. Impressive.
Had I known how beautiful you were, I would have brought Vette for a reunion sooner.
[Flirt] Hello pretty Twi'lek.
Oh, he's a smooth one. First things, first, though, yes?
I've already got all the beautiful Twi'lek women I need, thanks.
I'm here for Vette, not you.
Oh? You're---I see. Well, good luck cracking that safe.
Am I missing something?
Just jokes, love. Don't sweat it. Shall we talk business?
And this must be the lady Sith you've taken as your newest surrogate sister. Not a bad choice.
I am Sith and she serves. We are not family.
Vette works for me.
What she said.
I see. Well, to business then?
I didn't even realize I was missing a little sister until Vette came along.
I'm fond of Vette.
Only you would find a sweetheart Sith, love. Shall we, then?
We have the Star of Kala'unn. That's what this is about, right?
Let's talk business.
Yeah, let's do it. Reunions'll wait.
We trounced Cada Bliss and told him in no uncertain terms to find a new hobby.
Cada Bliss is dead. He's never going to torment another person or steal their history.
The Star of Kala'unn is in the case. Authentic and undamaged.
This is big.
Got that right. Most important single blow for Twi'lek pride. All you, Vette.
You've done something great for your people here.
Should be proud, Vette.
Amazing, little girl. Amazing. Who's got the finder's fee?
It was I that defeated Bliss and his man.
I did all the work.
Nobody's trying to minimize you. Let's wrap up.
We've got other places to be.
Are we done?
Nothing left but your finder's fee then.
Here. It's every credit we could scrape together. Don't worry, we should be able to sweet talk the museum into getting us some of that back.
Oh, no. I know you guys. You won't even be eating. You have to buy equipment, bribe fees--we don't need your credits. Do we?
I didn't fly back and forth across the galaxy just to waste fuel.
Of course we do. Pay up.
Right, right. Sorry.
Don't worry about it, love. It's the way of the galaxy. We'll always get more.
They are your people. It's your choice.
Your call, Vette.
Then I say keep the credits. Have a big dinner for me. Get some new gear.
You are doing good work here, reinvest your credits in your struggle.
We don't need your money.
Really not what I pictured from a Sith. Must be Vette's influence.
You coming with us, girl?
I...no. I've found a place. I'm going to stay put for a while. But I'll keep in touch.
You've at least got time for a meal, right? Let us show a Sith a good time?
Nobody celebrates like Sith celebrate.
Of course. Let's party.
I accept your challenge!
We can spare a few hours, I suppose.
If we have to.
A party animal. Clearly.
You don't have to leave right away, do you? What do you say we let Vette and the boys catch up for a while?
Of course. Maybe we should give them some time alone?
[Flirt] I can make time.
Oh, my. Sith really can read minds! Be good, kids. We'll be back.
Have fun!
I think Vette will want to see you as much as the others.
Let's all stay together.
Of course. How silly of me. To dinner, then?
So I just sat on him. Problem solved!
I missed you guys. I'll say hello whenever I can.
I have other obligations. Come on, Vette.
We need to leave. Now.
You heard the boss.
Be well, love. We'll miss you.
Watch your back out there, kid.
I don't believe I know you.
